verbose_text: The hepatic expression levels of AIF and EndoG in MCD fed CXCR3 -/- mice were significantly increased in mitochondrial fragment and decreased in cytosol protein compared to MCD fed WT mice, suggesting that CXCR3 deficiency also prevent caspase independent apoptosis.
evidence: CXCR3 deficiency also prevent caspase-independent apoptosis
